title: Dreamt I Was Gonna Be Your Man
lyrics:
It never feels right
To spend the night, Alone
I thought about what you said
As I walked home
You say your life's

like living inside a dream

If I know what you mean

It's not the way that it seems

Your life's like living inside a dream

It's not what it seems



Last night a had a dream

You walked up to me

And took my hand

Last night I had a dream

We talked and,

I was gonna be your man



Dreamt I was gonna me your man



It's never been easy for me

To make up my mind

But your voice comes echoing back

When I close my eyes



You say your life's

like living inside a dream

If I know what you mean

It's not the way that it seems



Your life's like living inside a dream

It's not what it seems



Last night I had a dream

You walked up to me

And took my hand

Last night I had a dream

We talked and

I was gonna be your man



Dreamt I was gonna me your man

Dreamt I was gonna me your man

Dreamt I was gonna me your man



Okay



Dreamt I was gonna me your man

Dreamt I was gonna me your man
